attributes.action: Champion angling to become a demonstration sport at the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see angling become a demonstation sport for the 2012 olympics in London.  Angling is the UK's largest participation sport, with 1000's of matches throughout the country every week.  Please help us make this a reality and let's see angling in the olympics!
